mechanics.trigger: When generating multiple Eldritch Blast beams
mechanics.condition: Caster level is 5th or higher (generates 2+ beams)
mechanics.outcome: Player may direct each beam at the same target or different targets

mechanics.trigger: When resolving multiple Eldritch Blast beams
mechanics.condition: Caster level is 5th or higher (generates 2+ beams)
mechanics.outcome: Each beam requires a separate ranged spell attack roll

description_text: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage. The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.
